name: Bryan Pardo
content: Bryan Pardo Homepage I head the Interactive Audio Lab. We invent technologies that transform how people generate, authenticate, manipulate, separate, hear, and understand sounds, with a focus on music and speech as problem domains. To learn more, visit our lab website. I co-direct the Northwestern University Center for Human Computer Interaction + Design. When I'm not being an academic, I make music with the Latin Folk Fusion ensemble Son Monarcas and the Jazz/Maqam ensemble The East Loop.
